pages.text: Now this one is not to be trifled with, nor is it useful on its own. This extraction rune can take the soul of a being and force it into a tear duct system. I have theorized that this can be used for some kind of teleportation, though it will not work with this rune alone.
Run cost: 200 Tears$(br)$(l:cages/tier_i)Tier I Soul Cage$(/l)$(br2)Thankfully it does not activate without a proper endpoint, such as the $(l:runes/destination)Destination Rune.$(/l)
